pages.text: You might be aware of the various techniques and technologies commonly grouped together as "forestry". Well luckily, they're all available to use! Of course, many of the thoroughly bred versions of trees don't exist in this land, but that doesn't stop you from breeding your own! ALL of Forestry is available, so make the most of it!

pages.title: Trees
pages.text: There might not be any growing in this new land when you first arrive, but you can breed your own using bees!

pages.title: Bees
pages.text: They're difficult to explain, but I'm sure you can find more information about them. Our initial scouting team noticed that bees were able to collect trace amounts of metals from the environment. Maybe they could be your key to dealing with the lack of metals?

pages.title: Butterfiles
pages.text: They look really pretty! I'm sure there's some kind of functionality to them as well, but this isn't the forester's manual.

pages.title: Tech
pages.text: There's so much that Forestry provides in terms of technology! You can produce power, use it to automate juicing fruit, brewing it, and even farming to an extent! It usually starts with some kind of casing, but higher levels of automation are generally more expensive in terms of metals.
